all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And truth is knowledge of things as they are, and as they were, and as they are to come;
Doctrine and Covenants 93:24
Quote of the Day
"We should neither believe those who falsely claim divine sanction nor venture into metaphorical deserts or secret chambers to be taught by counterfeits."
Elder Dale G. Renlund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
